ThingDef.label: fendra tail
ThingDef.description: A fluffy, bushy Fendra tail. What did you do...?

ThingDef.label: bionic fendra tail
ThingDef.description: A bionic Fendra tail. The exterior looks natural, although the fur is always immaculately groomed and fluffy. Microservos allow the user to move the tail with ease, and built-in sensors automatically distribute weight in the tail to improve balance.
